person_say: I'm having problems working with my team and it's delaying our progress. Is there any advice on improving our collaboration skills?
animal_say: Collaboration can be tricky! How are these team issues making you feel, and what’s affecting your progress?

person_say: I'm feeling quite frustrated and overwhelmed because the lack of collaboration is causing miscommunication and misunderstandings among us. It's really affecting our ability to finish tasks on time.
animal_say: I get it! You might find Bizy, our time management expert, super helpful for improving teamwork and overcoming those delays!

person_say: That sounds great! I would love to meet Bizy and get some tips on improving teamwork and time management.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bizy will share awesome strategies to enhance teamwork and boost your productivity. Let’s go meet her!
